title: Gathering Storm- Adaptive Calculation
body: Any details on how the AD or AP is calculated with this keystone? On someone like corki it could go either way - would like to guarantee it's the AD component though.

replies.body:
I know it's late but i just stumbled upon this searching for the same thing.
It's calculated with a formula with a fixed part and a variable (N). the variable is the number of times the rune has upgraded (in other words if we are in the tens it´s 1, between minute 20 and 29; 2 ETC.)
it´s quite obvious in the AP one. the formula being 8*N. however they are not a single scaling rune. for every 10 minutes you get a new rune and they add to the total. so when you reach 30 minutes you get +24 AP. but since you already had 24 AP from the previous ones ( 8+16) you get a total of 48 AP. the in-game text show you directly the total bonus AP.
the AD formula is a bit more confusing (and the reason why i didn´t get it). it appears that the fixed number is somewhere between 4,5 and 5. and so when they get decimals they round the number. I must admit that i haven´t bothered checking the exact number since it would requiere a lot of work and i don´t think we need more numbers that those aready provided by the game. this was just a puzzle i wanted to solve.
hope i helped (and that you read it) and if i was not clear in my explanation just ask. english is not my native language.
as to how the game decides which one to apply. I have not the faintes clue. I do suspect that is a database since i have seen things as stupid as the adaptative dmg gained from the rune fleeting when ramus is powerballing be ad... you literally can not use it without cancelling and loosing the buff.
